16  class Model : public ::Model {

54  return *this;

58  return ::GetCollisionRayModel(ray, *this);
59  }

63  return *this;

65

67  return ::IsModelAnimationValid(*this, anim);
68  }

71  inline void set(::Model model) {
72  transform = model.transform;
73 
74  meshCount = model.meshCount;
75  meshes = model.meshes;
76 
77  materialCount = model.materialCount;
78  materials = model.materials;
79  meshMaterial = model.meshMaterial;
80  boneCount = model.boneCount;
81  bones = model.bones;
